text: Toombs is a surname. Notable people with the name include: *Robert Toombs (1810-1885), U.S. Senator, first Secretary of State of the Confederacy and Confederate general *Roderick Toombs, better known as Roddy Piper (1954–2015), Canadian professional wrestler and actor *Rudy Toombs (c. 1914-1962), American songwriter *Sam Toombs (1871-1949), Australian politician ==See also== *Toombs County, Georgia
title: Toombs
